text:
This #AfricanUnion statement on #COVID19 #vaccine also serves as a reminder that, despite #WHO emphasis on #COVAX, meeting its intended targets wouldn't be enough anyway.🌍💉
(As an aside: this 270m is still less than 2/3 of the provisional doses Canada🇨🇦 has for 38m people.) https://t.co/YTGJ5qY8Oz https://t.co/3mPvDpp4Tz
